character.statement: Oops! I let a cat in the house. I'd better get it back out.
That's strange. The cat is gone. I wonder how it got out the door.
Anyway... I should search the apartment for clues about what happened to C.J.
I'd better get that cat back outside first.
It looks like a toy blimp.
Now's not the time to play.
Now's not the time for a snack.
You've been snooping around a little too much. This will put a stop to that!
